name: Jeffery I. Zucker
content: Jeffery Zucker -- Home Page Jeffery Zucker Current Status Professor, Department of Computing and Software, McMaster University (Emeritus since July 2017) Associate Member, Department of Mathematics, McMaster University Honorary Research Fellow, Department of Computer Science, Swansea University, Wales Mailing Address Dept of Computing and Software, McMaster University, Hamilton, Ont., L8S 4K1, Canada Office Information Technology Building 124 Phone (905) 525-9140 ext. 23438 Fax (905) 524-0340 Email zucker "AT" mcmaster "DOT" ca Education 1966 B.Sc., University of the Witwatersrand, Johannesburg, South Africa (Mathematics) 1971 Ph.D., Stanford University, California, USA (Mathematics) Areas of Interest Logic; Proof theory; Automatic proof checking Program semantics Logical foundations of software documentation Computability over abstract and topological algebras; Analog computability Membership in Professional Organizations Association for Symbolic Logic Computability & Complexity in Analysis Network Society for Academic Freedom and Scholarship Publications (See also under "Areas of Interest") Graduate Students Last revised Feb. 6, 2018 (Please inform me of any bad links.) zucker@mcmaster.ca
